## What's Included

The PDF/ePub includes the complete book:

| Part | Contents |
|------|----------|
| **Front Matter** | Preface by Patrick Roebuck, Foreword by Claude |
| **Part 1: Philosophy** | Multi-Agent Coordination, The Empathy Philosophy |
| **Part 2: Implementation** | Unified Memory System, Short-Term Memory, Practical Patterns |
| **Part 3: Examples** | Code Review Assistant, SBAR Clinical Handoff, Multi-Agent Coordination, Adaptive Learning |
| **Part 4: Reference** | Complete API documentation |
| **Appendix** | Glossary, Contributing guide |
